name: Marina Tsvetaeva
description:
Photo most likely from 1911
when Efron and Tsvetaeva met in Koktebel
before getting married.
They continue to visit for several years, including 1914.

Image of the town hall in Riga c. 1920.
Mayakovsky visited Riga in 1922,
which inspired a cycle of poems called "The West"
